title: Ellen van Dijk Grabs First Leader’s Jersey in la Vuelta España Femenina as Lidl-Trek Hammers Team Time Trial
content:
Dygert powers Canyon-SRAM to fifth in Vuelta opener, solid rides by EF Education-Easypost, Human Powered Health.

Read the full article at Ellen van Dijk Grabs First Leader’s Jersey in la Vuelta España Femenina as Lidl-Trek Hammers Team Time Trial on Velo.
author: sstokes
